sent.orig: Methods of treatment that succeed with one person may not succeed with another.
sent.trans: 对一个人生效的治疗方法也许对另一个人会无效。

sent.orig: Inspire other people to succeed and naturally you will tend to succeed more quickly!
sent.trans: 要激励别人成功，自然而然地你也就会更快地迈向成功！

sent.orig: It is literally true that you can succeed best and quickest by helping others to succeed.
sent.trans: 帮助别人成功是你走向成功最佳最快的途径。

sent.orig: For any one of us to succeed, we must succeed as one America.
sent.trans: 我们必须团结一致取得胜利，我们每一个人才能取得成功。

sent.orig: Sonny will succeed his father, and Michael will succeed Sonny to the position of Godfather.
sent.trans: Sonny继承其父，Michael将继承Sonny的教父地位。
